sentences.en: "She told you to stay here," Mike broke in.
sentences.cn: “她叫你呆在这儿，”迈克插嘴说。

sentences.en: 75 per cent of sixteen-year-olds stay on in full-time education.
sentences.cn: 75％的16岁孩子继续接受全日制教育。

sentences.en: An experienced Indian guide is provided during your stay.
sentences.cn: 在你逗留期间给你配备一位经验丰富的印第安向导。

sentences.en: An overnight stay at a friend's house disorients me.
sentences.cn: 在朋友家过夜让我觉得晕晕乎乎的。

sentences.en: Elizabeth had a standing invitation to stay with her.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白受到邀请，可以随时去她家住。

sentences.en: He tried to stay a few months every year in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 他每年都会争取在苏格兰住几个月。

sentences.en: How does he stay on top, 17 years after becoming foreign minister?
sentences.cn: 他是怎样在成为外交大臣以后的17年间保住最高职位的？

sentences.en: How long are they going to stay?
sentences.cn: 他们打算住多久？

sentences.en: I had to postpone ideas of a career and stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我不得不暂缓就业打算，呆在家里。

sentences.en: Mommy, you don't need to stay while we talk.
sentences.cn: 妈妈,我们谈话时你不必陪着.

sentences.en: Nine women gained weight, and four stayed the same .
sentences.cn: 九名女性体重增加，四名仍保持不变。

sentences.en: Rollings will stay as chairman this year.
sentences.cn: 罗林斯今年将继续担任主席一职。

sentences.en: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.cn: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

sentences.en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
sentences.cn: 起床过晚或过早。

sentences.en: The big factories are trying to stay alive by cutting costs.
sentences.cn: 大型工厂正试图通过削减成本以维持生存。

sentences.en: The Bishop directed the faithful to stay at home.
sentences.cn: 主教要求信徒们呆在家中。

sentences.en: the private sector is here to stay and likely to expand.
sentences.cn: 那个私营部门已经得到普遍认可并有可能扩大规模。

sentences.en: They had invited me to come to supper and stay the night.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请我去吃晚饭并住上一晚。

sentences.en: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.cn: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.en: they stayed up all night.
sentences.cn: 他们彻夜未眠。

sentences.en: To stay fit off season, I play tennis or football.
sentences.cn: 为了在休赛期间保持状态，我常打网球或踢足球。

sentences.en: Why don't you stay here and keep Emma company?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不呆在这儿，陪陪埃玛？

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: You stay here, you die. No two ways about it.
sentences.cn: 你若留在这里，必死无疑。
